# to make one's [[case]] [[worse]], to make things worse for oneself, to [[dig a hole for oneself]]
types.html:
aggraver son cas

  1. to make one's case worse, to make things worse for oneself, to dig a hole for oneself
trans: to make one's case worse, to make things worse for oneself, to dig a hole for oneself

title: aggraver son cas
